resources.string: Will I Miss Bart

Error: all of the data is invalid. Please edit your data and try again.
Done

In order to present information about BART that best suits you, it's required to enter in some information about the stations you are about. 

In addition to the name, it's also required to enter:
 - The direction from the station
 - The days of the week which you're interested the station
Enter the days you want to track this station on:
